issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: HiveServer2 should store connection params in ZK when using dynamic service discovery for simpler client connection string.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: It makes sense to setup the connection info in one place. Right now part of connection configuration happens in Utils#parseURL and part in the HiveConnection constructor.
fields.summary: JDBC driver not overlaying params supplied via properties object when reading params from ZK
